channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8153] TestJoinedScanners fails occasionally
item.description:
see https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/4908//testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver/TestJoinedScanners/testJoinedScanners/
and HBASE-7845

It should be a false alame, this's a placeholder to figure out the root cause.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Still there, for example on trunk build #4008

Failed 16 actions: FailedServerException: 16 times, 



Stacktrace



org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RetriesExhaustedWithDetailsException: Failed 16 actions: FailedServerException: 16 times, 

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HConnectionManager$HConnectionImplementation$Process$BatchErrors.makeException(HConnectionManager.java:2238)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HConnectionManager$HConnectionImplementation$Process$BatchErrors.rethrowIfAny(HConnectionManager.java:2222)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable.put(HTable.java:682)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestJoinedScanners.testJoinedScanners(TestJoinedScanners.java:110)

	at org.junit.runners.ParentRunner.runLeaf(ParentRunner.java:271)

	at org.junit.runners.BlockJUnit4ClassRunner.runChild(BlockJUnit4ClassRunner.java:70)

Logs are there: https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/ws/trunk/hbase-server/target/surefire-reports/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestJoinedScanners-output.txt

Liang Xie are you working on this? If you spent some time on this, do you have any idea on the root cause?
